text: Rahul Bose (born 27 July 1967) is an Indian actor, director, screenwriter, social activist, and athlete. Bose is the President of Indian Rugby Football Union.He has appeared in Bengali films such as Mr. and Mrs. Iyer, Kalpurush, Anuranan, Antaheen, Laptop and The Japanese Wife. == References == == Other websites == * * * * Rahul Bose environmental blog Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Rugby union players Category:Indian journalists Category:Actors from Mumbai Category:Indian activists Category:People from Punjab, India Category:Marathi people Category:Actors in Hindi cinema Category:Atheists Category:Reality television participants
title: Rahul Bose
